page.title: 14SHOPPING
page.content: The majority of people use the local shops for only some shopping; their main shopping is done either in Norwich or Wroxham. {Buxton}has six shops and a Post Office. The shops are a 'BOB' shop which is a food store, a Fish and Chip shop, a 'MACE MARKET' which is a food shop, ASHWOODS which is a hardware and haberdashery shop, a butchers and a hairdresser's shop. There is also a garage and petrol station. {Lammas}has just a Post Office which also sells sweets and a few groceries. {R.A.F. Coltishall}has a N.A.A.F.I. supermarket and petrol filling station. About 11% of people surveyed did all their shopping locally and 3.5% did no shopping at all locally.
